value.title: Is it a KNOWN ISSUE in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Hitting issues with Power BI can be frustrating. Having to call support can be even more frustrating! What if there was a way to see if it was a known issue in Power BI???  Power BI Support page and awareness https://support.powerbi.com  Power BI Known Issues documentation https://aka.ms/powerbiknownissues

value.title: Is your Power BI visualization misleading?
value.excerpt: Your Power BI visualization should communicate accurate information. However, you may be misleading your audience. Take care in what you are putting on your reports. value.title: IT Admin Takeover - Revisited!
value.excerpt: I take another look at how to take over a Shadow Tenant using the IT Admin Takeover process.
